articles.title: FIFA 22 cross-play test is coming in 'near future' - The Verge
articles.description: FIFA 22 will see a test of cross-play functionality in the “near future” between players on PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X and S, and Google’s cloud-gaming service Stadia. It’ll be limited to Online Seasons and Online Friendlies games.
articles.content:
Between PS5, Xbox Series X and S, and Google Stadia
A cross-play widget will appear in the bottom right of the screen when the test is available.
Image: EA
